pr_title: go cli changes to include meta data fields.

timeline.message: go cli changes to include meta data fields for show-server-template command

timeline.bodyText:
fix the comma before and after the space for template.Metadata
gofmt -d template.go
will show all the formatting errors. not sure why this is not being flagged during the build since we do call gofmt.
timeline.author: havetisyan
